qas.question: Where are the quartiers sensibles located?
What two neighborhoods are the centers of the quartiers sensibles?

context: These areas, quartiers sensibles ("sensitive quarters"), are in <a0_0>northern and eastern Paris<a0_0/>, namely around its <a1_0>Goutte d'Or and Belleville<a1_0/> neighbourhoods. To the north of the city they are grouped mainly in the Seine-Saint-Denis department, and to a lesser extreme to the east in the Val-d'Oise department. Other difficult areas are located in the Seine valley, in Évry et Corbeil-Essonnes (Essonne), in Mureaux, Mantes-la-Jolie (Yvelines), and scattered among social housing districts created by <a2_0>Delouvrier's 1961 "ville nouvelle" political initiative<a2_0/>.
